position.title: Founder
position.summary: - Ruby on Rails development - Web application development - Web-based customer satisfaction tools - Hosted web applications - User Interface design and front end development

position.title: Solution Architect
position.summary: Part of architecture team that develops worldwide software application frameworks for web storefronts and desktop call center applications using Microsoft .NET technology. Includes analyzing requirements, designing framework APIs, ensuring consistency and simplicity to enable regional extension. Evangelism of project throughout enterprise and partnering with other global teams to deliver the most robust and efficient platform for our business customers. Working closely with Microsoft consultants onstaff and in Redmond in order to influence future versions of Microsoft development products.
